purpose: Facilitates research and development in the field of Android AI agents by providing a platform for experimentation and prototyping.
principle: Builds on Python and utilizes AI/ML frameworks to create and manage Android-based AI agents for various experimental purposes.
reusability: Designed for research and experimentation, allowing users to prototype and test AI agent models on Android devices.
limitations: Limited to experimental use; not optimized for production environments or large-scale deployments.
name: Android-Lab
